data.eml:eml: Abrotoxyela gen. nov. (Insecta, Hymenoptera, Xyelidae) from the Middle Jurassic of Inner Mongolia, China

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Gao, Taiping, Ren, Dong, Shih, Chungkun (2009): Abrotoxyela gen. nov. (Insecta, Hymenoptera, Xyelidae) from the Middle Jurassic of Inner Mongolia, China. Zootaxa 2094: 52-59, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.187569
